Provinces included & Notes: Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Shanxi, and Inner Mongolia (without Chifeng, Hinggan, Hulunbuir, and Tongliao)
Liaoning, Jilin, Heilongjiang, and Eastern Inner Mongolia (Chifeng, Hinggan, Hulunbuir, and Tongliao)
The above-mentioned seven entities plus the claimed Taiwan Province.Taiwan and its surrounding island groups are administered by the Republic of China but claimed by the People's Republic of China.
Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Hong Kong, and Macau
Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan, Tibet, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, and Xinjiang
